title: Hypnotic Hypnotizer

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> When you hypnotize someone, you may give them up to 5 feedback messages. You create the messages.

> You have the option to erase your target's feedback when you hypnotizing them, making it where they only receive the fake feedback.

> With the Necronomicon, any message you send to a player becomes true, but you can only send 1 message per night. The host reserves the right to deny any message that would create too powerful an effect.

fields.name: Win Con:
fields.value: > Kill all who oppose the Coven.

desc:
Post 1577
*"Your getting very sleepy... and feel guilt from haunted by a jester... and were converted into a Vampire... and coldsnapped by Eyisa... and revived by an Old Retributionist... oh wait I wasn't supposed to say that yet."*
